wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Divett Hayter, 1st Baron Haversham,  (9 August 1835 – 10 May 1917), known as Sir Arthur Hayter, Bt, from 1878 to 1906, was a British Liberal politician. He served as Financial Secretary to the War Office under William Gladstone from 1882 to 1885.

response: *Arthur Hayter, 1st Baron Haversham, Financial Secretary to the War Office 1882–85, and Liberal MP 1865–68, 1873–85, 1893–95 & 1900–06
